amendment.description: To provide that acceptance by a military officer of appointment to the position of Director of National Intelligence or Director of the Central Intelligence Agency shall be conditional upon retirement of the officer after the assignment.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4311 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
